text: Inon kasone hastand, ki ʙa eson kitoʙu hikmat va nuʙuvvat ʙaxsidem. Pas, [ej pajomʙar] agar inon [ musrikon] ʙa in [pajomʙaron va kitoʙhoi ilohi] kufr ʙivarzand, hatman, guruh [-i muhocirin va ansor va toʙein]-ro ʙar [hifzu nigahʙonii] on [usulu aqoid] megumorem, ki nisʙat ʙa on kofir naʙosand
